features.title: Bulk License Reclamation
features.description: Process multiple users for license reclamation in a single operation with partial success support

features.title: User Activity History
features.description: Query detailed activity history per user with pagination and date filtering

features.title: Scheduled Reports
features.description: CRUD for automated email reports with weekly/monthly scheduling

schemaChanges: Added ScheduledReport model with frequency, reportType, recipients, dayOfWeek/dayOfMonth fields
lessonsLearned: Bulk operations should support partial success with detailed per-item results
Activity history linked via windowsUsernames relation
Report schedules need validation for frequency-specific required fields
Batch size limits prevent abuse (100 users max)
